name: Batida de Maracujá e Coco
keywords: cachaça, coconut cream, sweetened condensed milk, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce coconut cream, like Coco Lopez
3/4 ounce fresh unsweetened passion fruit purée or juice

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine all ingredients; put in condensed milk last. Blend until smooth.
